meanings.definition: To disconnect or separate from something
meanings.sent1: She disassociates herself from negative influences.
meanings.sent2: The cable disassociates easily from the socket.
meanings.sent3: The cat disassociates from the noisy dog next door.
meanings.sent4: His mind disassociates from reality when he reads science fiction.
meanings.sent5: The magician disassociates the ring from the rope in a surprising trick.

meanings.definition: To break ties or connections with something
meanings.sent1: He disassociates from toxic relationships for his well-being.
meanings.sent2: The company disassociates from any involvement in the scandal.
meanings.sent3: The student disassociates from procrastination by setting a timer.
meanings.sent4: The old house disassociates from its haunted past with a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent5: The athlete disassociates from self-doubt to focus on winning the game.
